Name: survival motor neuron spinal muscular atrophy
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy that is associated with the survival of motor neuron protein.

Name: Kennedy's disease
Definition: A spinal muscular dystrophy that has_material_basis_in an X-linked recessive expansion of CAG triplet repeats (glutamine) in exon 1 of AR gene encoding the androgen receptor.
Synonym: X-linked Spinal and Bulbar Muscular Atrophy

Name: autosomal dominant adult-onset proximal spinal muscular atrophy
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy characterized by adult-onset of slowly progressive

Name: X-linked distal spinal muscular atrophy 3
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy characterized by slowly progressive atrophy and weakness of distal muscles of hands and feet with absence of cognitive
Synonym: X-linked recessive distal spinal muscular atrophy

Name: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance.
Synonym: autosomal recessive distal spinal muscular atrophy

Name: autosomal dominant distal hereditary motor neuronopathy
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance.
Synonym: autosomal dominant distal spinal muscular atrophy

Name: anterior horn cell disease
